mapper.select: select perid as insano, username as inname from TB_XUSERS WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE (isnull(username,'') Like concat('%',#{inname},'%') or isnull(perid,'') Like concat('%',#{inname},'%') ) and flag = 'CC' and useyn = 'Y' ORDER BY username
select cifcode, cifcodename from cifcode where cifcode not in ('00', '$0') and isnull(cifcode,'') Like concat('%',#{cifcode},'%') order by cifcode
mapper.update: UPDATE CIFCODE SET cifcodename = #{cifcodename} where cifcode = #{cifcode}
mapper.select: select max(nseq) from tb_mnotice where Left(nseq,6) = #{nseq}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_mnotice (custcd, spjangcd, nseq, ninputdate, ngourpcd, nsubject, nmemo, npernm, nflag, frdate, todate) values (#{custcd}, #{spjangcd}, #{nseq}, #{ninputdate}, #{ngourpcd}, #{nsubject}, #{nmemo}, #{npernm}, #{nflag}, #{frdate}, #{todate})
mapper.select: select nseq, ninputdate, ngourpcd, nsubject, nfilename, npernm, nmemo, nflag, isnull((select com_rem1 from tb_ca510 where com_cls = '004' and com_code <> '00' and com_code=ngourpcd),'') as cnam, (select Count(*) from tb_mattach where flag='NN' and board_idx=nseq and delete_yn = 'N') as attcnt, Left(frdate,4) + '-' + substring(frdate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(frdate, 7,2) as frdate, Left(todate,4) + '-' + substring(todate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(todate, 7,2) as todate from tb_mnotice WITH (NOLOCK) Where 1 = 1 AND nsubject like concat('%',#{nsubject},'%') AND ( ngourpcd like concat('%',#{ngourpcd},'%') OR nflag = 'Y') order by nseq desc;
